attributes.action: Allow ex-pats to have id cards issued to them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current proposed legislation does not permit non resident UK citizens to obtain a UK ID card. In some countries, this means that EX-PAT have to carry their passport at all times as a form of official identification. As the passport is a valuable document and can be difficult to replace if lost, an EX-PAT should have the option to apply for an ID card.
